original_title: クレーム処理のため自らマネキンになった女子社員～麗しのマネキン夫人外伝～ 永瀬ゆい
overview: Venus project that the new product super real mannequin is in a difficult situation on the day of release because it is recalled due to initial failure. Furthermore, the tragedy of receiving mannequin orders from important business partners strikes. To save the big pinch of such a company ... To take this opportunity to aim for career advancement ... Yui, a female employee of Ochakumihei, has stood up! "I ... I'll be a mannequin!" The management, who believed in Yui's determination, bet on company luck and sent out Yui ...
title: A Female Employee Volunteers To Be A Mannequin To Settle A Dispute - Beautiful Mannequin Wife - Yui Nagase
